SELECT t.user_type AS type ,t.name name, t.id AS id, if(user_type=1,
(SELECT sum((1 - tmu.cost_scale) * tupr.price * tmu.ivision_proportion) FROM tb_user_purchase_record AS tupr JOIN tb_collector AS tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id JOIN tb_manager_user AS tmu ON tmu.id = tc.property_id WHERE tmu.id=t.id),
((SELECT sum((1 - (SELECT cost_scale FROM tb_manager_user WHERE id = tc.property_id) )*tupr.price)* (SELECT sum(ivision_proportion) FROM tb_manager_user WHERE user_type = #{type} AND id IN (SELECT manager_user_id FROM tb_manager_user_collector WHERE collector_id = tc.id )) FROM tb_user_purchase_record tupr JOIN tb_collector tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id WHERE tc.id IN (SELECT id FROM tb_collector)))) AS income,
if(user_type=1,
(SELECT sum((1 - tmu.cost_scale) * tupr.price * tmu.ivision_proportion) FROM tb_user_purchase_record AS tupr JOIN tb_collector AS tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id JOIN tb_manager_user AS tmu ON tmu.id = tc.property_id WHERE tmu.id=t.id AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')),
((SELECT sum((1 - (SELECT cost_scale FROM tb_manager_user WHERE id = tc.property_id) )*tupr.price)* (SELECT sum(ivision_proportion) FROM tb_manager_user WHERE user_type = #{type} AND id IN (SELECT manager_user_id FROM tb_manager_user_collector WHERE collector_id = tc.id )) FROM tb_user_purchase_record tupr JOIN tb_collector tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id WHERE tc.id IN (SELECT id FROM tb_collector) AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')))) AS income_day,
if(user_type=1,
(SELECT sum((1 - tmu.cost_scale) * tupr.price * tmu.ivision_proportion) FROM tb_user_purchase_record AS tupr JOIN tb_collector AS tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id JOIN tb_manager_user AS tmu ON tmu.id = tc.property_id WHERE tmu.id=t.id AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')),
((SELECT sum((1 - (SELECT cost_scale FROM tb_manager_user WHERE id = tc.property_id) )*tupr.price)* (SELECT sum(ivision_proportion) FROM tb_manager_user WHERE user_type = #{type} AND id IN (SELECT manager_user_id FROM tb_manager_user_collector WHERE collector_id = tc.id )) FROM tb_user_purchase_record tupr JOIN tb_collector tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id WHERE tc.id IN (SELECT id FROM tb_collector) AND DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m')))) AS income_month FROM tb_manager_user t WHERE t.status!=1 GROUP BY t.id

SELECT sum((1 - tmu.cost_scale) * tupr.price * tmu.ivision_proportion) AS 'income', DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%m') AS 'name' FROM tb_user_purchase_record tupr JOIN tb_collector tc ON tupr.collector_id = tc.id JOIN tb_manager_user tmu ON tmu.id = tc.property_id WHERE tmu.id = #{id} AND year(tupr.ctime) = #{date} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tupr.ctime, '%m');
